ing: 1 red bell pepper, cut into 1/4-inch cubes
1 green bell pepper, cut into 1/4-inch cubes
1 teaspoon lemon juice, or to taste
des: "Israeli salad. Use a full-flavored olive oil. Optional: add minced olives, feta cheese, or cilantro."
ins: Toss tomatoes, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, cucumber, radishes, olive oil, scallion, lemon juice, sumac, and salt together in a bowl; let stand for flavors to blend, about 20 minutes.
